Name: Stones of Solace
About the game: Stones of Solace is a minimalistic and contemplative ritual, offering you a quiet space for relaxation. Find out what your idol is every day, and take some of your time to craft them a gift. The game offers a different shrine each day, that the player can visit whenever they feel like. Each zone brings a new atmosphere and new items to play with. After a time of contemplation and self reflection around the stone statue, players might enjoy arranging the items in the way they like, as an offering for the statue and for themselves. A game by Dziff & Armel Gibson Music by Jason Sutherland Stones of Solace is part of Ice Water Games democratic label~
Meta Title: Stones of Solace: Aug 20, 2019, Dziff and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Stones of Solace? Check out the release date (Aug 20, 2019), developer insights from Dziff, and a complete game summary.
